decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Owner's Permission - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.

Condition : 2 - Hazards - No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to endanger persons using any highway, railway, waterway, dock, harbour or aerodrome (civil or military), obscure or hinder the ready interpretation of any traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or hinder the operation of any device used for the purpose of security or surveillance or for measuring the speed of any vehicle.

Condition : 3 - Clean and Tidy Condition - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site.
Condition : 4 - Safety - Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public.

Condition : 5 - Removal if Necessary - Where an Advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity.

Condition : 6 - The advertisement hereby granted consent shall only be displayed during the Wimbledon Championships Fortnight in 2022. The temporary advertisement banner shall only be displayed between 22/06/24 - 20/07/24. 

Reason:  The signage or hoarding is only considered acceptable for a limited period having regard to the visual amenities of the area and the following Development Plan policies for Merton: policy CS14 of Merton's Core Planning Strategy 2011 and policy DM D5 of Merton's Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 7 - The subject matter of the proposed temporary advertisement banner shall relate to the Wimbledon Lawn Tennis Championships as shown on the submitted photo montage received 20/12/2023.

Reason: In the interests of visual amenity and to ensure that the temporary advertisement is appropriate for display during the Wimbledon Tennis Fortnight.
description: TEMPORARY BANNERS TO BE DISPLAYED FOR THE 2024 WIMBLEDON CHAMPIONSHIPS FORTNIGHT ONLY
